Title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Writer: George R.R. Martin (based on "A Song of Ice and Fire" by), David Benioff (created by), D.B. Weiss (created by), Bryan Cogman (written for television by)
Actors: Peter Dinklage, Nikolaj Coster-Waldau, Lena Headey, Aidan Gillen
Plot: Arya is put to the test. Tyrion and Jorah are captured by slavers. Loras Tyrell is judged by the Sparrows. Jaime and Bronn face the Sand Snakes. Sansa marries Ramsay Bolton.
